snippet: HEDISON--Bridget, wife of actor David Hedison, died of breast cancer on February 22 in her home in Beverly Hills. She was 71. Bridget is survived by her husband David, her daughters Alexandra and Serena, and daughter-in-law Jodie Foster. Bridget is remembered with love by her family in South Africa and London. 1/3
